doc:
Buffy Dee https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buffy_Dee 0 Buffy Dee, born Anthony DeSantolo (1923–1995), was an Italian-American actor and musician. Buffy Dee suffered from Polio as a child and spent a short portion of his life in wheelchair. Although he recovered, he was left with a slight limp. He went to school for Law and finally finished his degree at the University of Miami. He married Eleanor Korn. He did not have any children. Buffy Dee was a drummer for Carmen Cavallaro. Buffy_Dee , born Anthony_DeSantolo ( 1923 – 1995 ) , was an_Italian-American_actor_and_musician . Buffy_Dee suffered from Polio as a_child and spent a_short_portion of his_life in wheelchair . Although he recovered , he was_left with a_slight_limp . He went to school for Law and finally finished his_degree at the_University of Miami . He married Eleanor_Korn . He did_not_have any_children . Buffy_Dee was a_drummer for Carmen_Cavallaro .
